description:
Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous – but little do they know the plan is overheard! Meanwhile, Luffy’s grueling battle against Katakuri intensifies!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Bedrohung durch Mogura! – Ruffys stiller Kampf!
La menace de Mogura. Le combat silencieux de Luffy !
Mogura no Kyoui: Luffy Chinmoku no Tatakai!
The Threat of the Mole! Luffy`s Silent Fight!
Копьё земляного дракона! Молчаливый бой Луффи!
土竜の脅威 ルフィ沈黙の戦い!
